semantic_identifier: [GOLD-88]: Follow-up workflow: Task queue shows incorrect ordering and missing next actions
title: Follow-up workflow: Task queue shows incorrect ordering and missing next actions

sections.text: Fix the follow-up task queue to consistently surface the correct “next best action” per account/opportunity, ordered by due date and risk/priority signals. Resolve cases where tasks fail to appear after creation or state changes (e.g., completion, reassignment, CRM sync). Add minimal logging/telemetry around task generation and queue rendering to validate the fix in production.
